item.description:
Speed dating is a great way to meet lots of new people in a fast, fun, no-pressure environment.When else do you get the chance to date a mass quantity of people in one night! Each 'date' will last three minutes and at the end if you want to spend more than three minutes with someone, you have the chance to hang out at the bar. If there is a mutual match we will make sure your contact information is shared. What an effective and efficient way to date! Our last singles event was a success, but this time we can only accept 20 male and 20 females so hurry and get your tickets today.

How it works: We'll set up approximately 20 different tables and position one female and male at each one. Then we'll start the timer, after three minutes, the guys will rotate tables until everyone has had twenty dates. Why just three minutes? We think three minutes is just enough time for our singles to get to know each other, but not too much time to stop them from figuring out if their date is, or more importantly, is not a possible match.

Suggested Attire: Dress to impress.

Directions: http://maps.google.co...

Cost: $20.00
Get your tickets at:
www.thingstodoboston.com
item.name: Singles Speed Dating
